title: Sketchbook Folio, "Study of Waves Crashing on Rocky Cliffs", 1870–85
medium: Graphite on cream wove paper, bound
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Rough, choppy ocean across foreground. At right, in middleground, dark rocks. At right behind rocks, cliffs in two sections.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Study of Waves Crashing on Rocky Cliffs", 1870–85.
1870–85. Graphite on cream wove paper, bound. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-86-42.
